segments.text: I've been chosen to plan the next family reunion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fun for you ! Do you get to do anything you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep . And I should start planning now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does everyone usually show up for your family reunions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just about . There are at least a few hundred in our immediate family alone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How Ay days will the reunion be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Usually it's at least five days and four nights .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is going to be a major production for you !
segments.speaker: S2
